channel.title: Whats wrong with this code?

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

[quote=“JRealm, post:9, topic:197262”]I’ve Tested at mine. it has nothing to do with it. Its something else.
Anyway heres a fixed code rofl:

case 900: { if(personInsideCaves = true) { sendMessage("There is already someone in here, please try again later."); } else if(personInsideCaves = false) { sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Are you sure your ready to do the Fight Caves?", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes!", 2461); sendFrame126("No!", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; setSidebarInterface(6, -1); } } break; [/quote]

Lol I just said my code worked fine. The originally posted above. It was another code I just added that gave me the errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

I’ve Tested at mine. it has nothing to do with it. Its something else.
Anyway heres a fixed code rofl:

case 900:
{
if(personInsideCaves = true)
{
sendMessage("There is already someone in here, please try again later.");
}
else if(personInsideCaves = false)
{
sendFrame171(1, 2465);
				sendFrame171(0, 2468);
				sendFrame126("Are you sure your ready to do the Fight Caves?", 2460);
				sendFrame126("Yes!", 2461);
				sendFrame126("No!", 2462);
				sendFrame164(2459);
				NpcDialogueSend = true;
				setSidebarInterface(6, -1);        
}
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

zubmage:

Remove the first {

Nope :\

Man lol. You can tell I’ve been working on this for a long time if I can’t figure out which brackets aren’t right… I’m going to give up on it today and come back to it tomorrow. It’s late, tomorrow I could get it instantly.

And I’ve defined the boolean “personIsInsideCaves.”

OMG LOL. I knew I had the code right when I did it. The problem wasn’t even that code that was giving me the 100 errors. I knew I could figure out which brackets I needed and didn’t :p. Well time to figure out what I did wrong somewhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

You dont need the first bracket under case 900: etc. In the cases of the switch statements, you dont need brackets
unless you have the ‘if’ statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?

item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

case 900:
{
if(personInsideCaves = true)
{
sendMessage("There is already someone in here, please try again
later.");
}
else if(personInsideCaves = false)
{
sendFrame171(1, 2465);
				sendFrame171(0, 2468);
				sendFrame126("Are you sure your ready to do the Fight Caves?", 2460);
				sendFrame126("Yes!", 2461);
				sendFrame126("No!", 2462);
				sendFrame164(2459);
				NpcDialogueSend = true;
				setSidebarInterface(6, -1);        
}
}
break;

Whats wrong with this code? I’ve been coding my fight caves for hours, so I’m kinda to tired to know what I’m doing atm…
